attributes.action: An award for those who served in Germany, BAOR during the cold war.
attributes.additional_details: To acknowledge the service of our service personnel during the cold war.
attributes.background: Award a General service medal with bar BAOR for those who served in Germany etc during the cold war.. For those many that have already a GSM, award the bar only.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that ask for someone to be given an honour, or have an honour taken away.
